doc.field: Christian and/or Anti-Communist Publications from Organizations such as Citizens Action Committee and Christian Crusade; House Committee on Un-American Activities Reports; Committee of One Million Against the Admission of Communist China to the United Nations Publications and Promotional Materials; Citizens Foreign Aid Committee/The Taxpayers Committee to End Foreign Aid Correspondence and Bulletins; and Freedom Club Bulletin, Christopher News Notes, and Footprints in Time (Christianity Today).
